title: IBM Cloud DevSecOps docs
introduction: Adopt a DevSecOps approach by using IBM Cloud Continuous Delivery, which includes open toolchains that automate the building and deploying of applications. Leverage the docs, architecture references, and more to support your build and deploy needs.

section_recommended.title: Part 1: Set up prerequisites to deploy a secure app with DevSecOps
section_recommended.description: Part 1 of a 4-part tutorial series: Learn about DevSecOps by using a complete reference implementation that is available as a service and powered by IBM Cloud Continuous Delivery.

section_recommended.title: Part 2: Set up a Continuous Integration (CI) toolchain
section_recommended.description: Part 2 of a 4-part tutorial series: Use the CI toolchain template to develop your application. The toolchain is preconfigured for continuous deployment with inventory integration, change management, and evidence collection.

section_recommended.title: Part 3: Set up a Continuous Deployment (CD) toolchain
section_recommended.description: Part 3 of a 4-part tutorial series: Use the CD toolchain template for continuous deployment of your application, evidence collection, GitOps flow, change management, and compliance scans.

section_recommended.title: Part 4: Set up a Continuous Compliance (CC) toolchain
section_recommended.description: Part 4 of a 4-part tutorial series: Use the CC toolchain template to ensure that your deployed artifacts and their source repositories are always compliant.

section_recommended.title: Introduction to DevSecOps
section_recommended.description: Learn about DevSecOps, which includes the automation of security and compliance controls as part of continuous integration and continuous deployment processes.

section_recommended.title: Working with incident issues
section_recommended.description: Learn how to create, store, and update incident issues as part of the Continuous Integration and Continuous Compliance pipelines.

tiles.title: Integration for Infrastructure as Code now available as a Toolchain template
tiles.description: DevSecOps Continuous Integration for Infrastructure as Code is available as a Toolchain template in the Toolchain catalog. For more information.

tiles.title: CRA scans and Cocoa Tekton improvements
tiles.description: CRA scans are now part of the `app-preview-pr-listener` in the CI pipeline. Also, Cocoa Tekton `get-pipeline-logs` supports pulling logs for specific stages.

tiles.title: CRA issue parser improvements
tiles.description: CRA issue parser now contains an `Introduced by` field when creating a new issue found during a scan.
